website_summaries.verdict: With plenty of power and features, this small desktop computer can easily be situated on a desk.
pros: Runs the latest software and games courtesy of 9th Gen Intel processor
Offers SSD and HDD for more than 1 TB of combined storage
Nice to find a DVD-RW drive in such a small desktop computer
cons: Pricier than some larger desktop models
Could use a faster graphics card

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Computer
customer_reviews.text: Computer came exactly as described - checked system description against amazon. Per another review where they did not load Windows on SSD drive - perhaps that was an error or maybe they changed because of that review - but my computer came with Windows loaded on the SSD drive - very quick loading. Computer arrived promptly and in very good shape. Have 2 monitors attached, no issues. Speed is great for what I'm using for - personal and work. At this point, extremely happy with this purchase. Will update later if I have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: KJones

customer_reviews.title: Buy the HP instead
customer_reviews.text: The operating system was installed on the slow drive not on the solid state. Plus there were other problems. I sent it back and got a HP which worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: SaltyCracker

customer_reviews.title: Operating System not on SSD.
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered timely and packaged nicely but as others have stated, the operating system is installed on the regular hard drive and not the sold state drive. This really defeats the purpose of a SSD and now i have to figure out how to clone the OS to the SSD and boot from there.
customer_reviews.author: Almin Cinac

customer_reviews.title: Not for seniors with limited computer savvy
customer_reviews.text: Bought computer for home use. Windows 10 may be great for computer geeks, but not for seniors with limited computer savvy. Could not access AOL account after 5 hours of trying Windows tips & suggestions. Online assistance from Dell is not acceptable. While trying to re-establish AOL, received notice of over 170 security risky connections associated with Microsoft Edge, which has more bells & whistles than necessary. Refurbishing old unit now. At least it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2yr warranty ????
customer_reviews.text: computer is great, but where is the 2yr warranty, I have no paperwork for any warranty. Help if you can!
customer_reviews.author: James52

customer_reviews.title: Priced right and a fast machine
customer_reviews.text: Refurbished computer, but in most cases; the fault is in the hard drive made by another manufacturer. That is an easy call.....as the computer itself is usually 100% operational. Dell has a very good Quality control department and the main chassis with motherboard undergoes a strenuous examination prior to leaving the assembly room. I was informed that many of the Refurbished systems are actually NEW over manufactured machines sitting in a warehouse needing to be moved out at all cost. As long as Dell can move them out and recover their basic cost; and keep the staff busy (so not to lay anyone off) they are satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Meggie

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a new Dell Inspiron full desktop through Costco during a sale ($200 off). It was configured similarly, but wouldn't fit into my workspace. To top things off, the network card failed, so back to Costco it went. This machine fits my workspace and replaces my previous Inspiron 3647, a slightly larger machine than this one, but one which had considerably slowed down over the years, in spite of refreshing it a few times. Having Windows, MS Office, and other critical apps on the SDD C:/ drive speeds up everything considerably, with my numerous Access databases on the 1TB HDD. Starts up cold in a matter of seconds, not minutes. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Charley Pennell

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty computer savvy and I just love this Dell Inspiron 3470. It's fast, super quiet, and was easy to set up. A big plus is that it has a CD/DVD drive and is 9th generation i5 Core. I don't do gaming, but for a small business or home use, this is an amazing value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: BeautyAddictMichele

customer_reviews.title: great little desk top for the price
customer_reviews.text: The system is compact and doesn't take up much desk space. Because it is so small, the is very little room to add a high power gaming video card. A single thickness card will fit, but the specs will be far below modern gaming needs. Having said that, the integrated video hardware in the motherboard shares your RAM, reducing what is really available to the computer. So, unless all you do is type up simple notes and emails, you would benefit from a PCIe 16x, single slot video card.
customer_reviews.author: Nimrod

customer_reviews.title: false advertising
customer_reviews.text: What's the deal here? This machine came in unmarked packaging with a very small instruction from Indonesia. The worst part is that it advertises a 4.2 Ghz processor but it came with an Intel 3.60 Ghz. I don't know what else I might find yet. I think it will probably have to go back. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to send it back
customer_reviews.text: The C drive had no space for my programs. None of my programs wanted to install onto the D drive, and if I did install on the D drive, it wouldn't save files or find files from the D drive. Tech assistance was terrible! I called twice, the first guy didn't know what I was talking about for the C and D drives. The second guy said they all come like that and dells are switching to having bigger D drives. The stress wasn't worth my money or time, so I sent it back and got another computer. Thank god for Amazon's wonderful return process, it really is the best creation after air conditioning and the internet.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Saenz

customer_reviews.title: Great Dell Computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer is excellent for our busy office, it has lots of space to accommodate the numerous programs we have loaded up. We love Dell products
customer_reviews.author: Dar Y

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home computer
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my husband for Christmas. Bless his heart.. he has been using a refurbished computer for about 3 years and it was about to bite the dust.. I actually thought I saw smoke coming from that thing. So Santa was gracious enough to put this under the tree for him. So easy to hook up, plug in and GO! He is not computer savvy so this was more than easy for him. This is actually more computer than he will ever need. It is a great deal! I am a shopper and like to compare and shop around and found this to be a great deal. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: SLK

customer_reviews.title: SSD has Windows operating system on my PC
customer_reviews.text: The PC I have received has Windows 10 on Solid State Disk (SSD), unlike some of the previous reviews mentioned that the Windows was on Hard Disk. The PC is working fine without problems so far, though it is only a few days since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Gadisetti, C.

customer_reviews.title: OS is on the hard drive, not the solid state drive
customer_reviews.text: I read at least one review that the os came installed on the HDD not the SSD. but others said it was on the SSD. I contacted the seller and he stated the os would be installed on the SSD, which is how it should be . Turns out mine came with OS on the HDD. Who can you trust these days?
customer_reviews.author: Brad Krantz

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is horrible! Died in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: The computer crashed in less than 1 year. The advertisement of 2 year On Site is very deceptive. They won't come out and fix it. I'm being told that my only option is to reload Windows 10 and lose everything on the computer. Pretty frustrating when you pay close to $700 for a computer tower. The fact that you can't understand ANY customer service representative is even more frustrating. Guess I'm done with Dell & so is my company!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: Such an easy to install and set up computer. Was a MAC user but switched over to Windows as it is much more user friendly. Desktop is very quite and small to save space. Only thing I wish it had was 2 HDMI or 2 VP slots for dual monitor. I was able to do 1 HDMI and 1 VP but would have been easier having the same cord/plug in. Also one of the cord is the older version so it does not have as best quality as the other one but still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: False advertizing
customer_reviews.text: First when I set this up there was only 8 GB of ram instead of 12 GB as advetised. Second is there was only the 1 TB drive and no 128 GB Solid State Drive. I did get it on sale before Christmas but just had time to start setting it up for operations. I intend to upgrade the ram anyway, but I am very disappointed that the solid state drive was not included.
customer_reviews.author: D. Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Great computer for the price
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews of this and other computers before my purchase. While I may not have the tech credentials of some reviews I can comment on a few things. First the operating system is installed on the solid state drive on this PC. Second the PC boots fast and is fast at basic things. Lastly if you need a simple computer this could be a good choice for you.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent computer! Dell continues to lin
customer_reviews.text: This is used for home business, not gaming. We did not need tech support to get the computer up and running top notch! Installation and set up was seamless. I purchased it for my dad who is computer savvy at 76 and needed to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Very Noisy and not good for business
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed in this computer that all default files saves on the SSD. For some reason I couldn't connect this PC on the network even connected into Ethernet cable, it was really weird and even my IT consultant found very odd that it couldn't connect to a Private Network. The other thing I've also noticed is that this PC is noisy, I mean you could literally listen to it on the next door office. Horrible experience that is why I had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Frederico Costa

customer_reviews.title: Great for work, FAST, not great for 4K Monitors or games.
customer_reviews.text: I really love the PC, I feel like I got my money's worth. It works really fast with opening programs because of the ssd. You can't really run games with it, and I'm having trouble with lag when using a 4K monitor. It seems like the computer struggles to output that much resolution. It still works fast, but the image is stuttering and lagging behind audio frequently on the 4K monitor. It doesn't have this problem on my 24" monitor, everything is extra snappy on that. Still, I think it's a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect home computer
customer_reviews.text: New computer to replace our old Dell. Easy to set up and transfer data. Hoping this will last 10 years like our old one did!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Naber

customer_reviews.title: Vender did not provide a replacement computer as promised
customer_reviews.text: The computer was returned because it did not work it was mailed using the mailing envelopes and mailing slips and we have not received a replacement for the bad computer please refund us immediately.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: The SSD drive is too small and tech support is useless.
customer_reviews.text: The SSD drive is too small to move software from your old computer to this computer. You would have to start over and re-install your software. The 'free' tech support was completely useless when i could understand them. Then they try to get you to pay for better support.
customer_reviews.author: Tony No

customer_reviews.title: Great home office use
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this computer. I am not tech savvy and I am not a gamer. I just wanted a decent home office computer that supports duel monitors and runs smoothly, this unit does just that! Set up was super simple and it supports all the devices and applications I was using on my old computer. I was up and running in less than an hour which including installing all the programs I was using on my old computer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item and it was shipped without software. I returned it and the new one also did not have the software. Dell worked with me for over and hour trying to diagnose, but was unable to help. I eventually returned and was given my full amount back.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Williams

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Good for everyday use and work. I also play some old school games on it and some indie sidescrollers. The OS came installed on the SSD but I was surprised that only 60 GB was available with only the OS installed. I use the 1tb for storage and downloads.
customer_reviews.author: paolo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: So far, I am very unhappy with this cpu. I bought it because my older one had become so slow and had freezing issues. This brand new one is even slower. I am very disappointed with it.
customer_reviews.author: Motown Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a 'backup' to my husband's work computer and it has become so much more! Easy to set up, easier to run. I always have numerous tabs open to bounce between email accounts, track a package, listen to music, work...... This computer has become my family hub
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OS is on the SSD Drive
customer_reviews.text: I dont know about some of the other reviews, but it would only make sense to put the OS on the SSD Drive, as thats the main feature. (quick strt times). Great little computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Earle

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money - Junk!
customer_reviews.text: This just quit working with no warning. An orange light and a brief error screen says it’s the mother-board. This was purchased for my secretary. I mm really p*ssed off!
customer_reviews.author: Bolo

customer_reviews.title: Very professional from order to delivery.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time. Very good packaging. Came up and downloads all updates. Very pleased with this dell computer.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great computer
customer_reviews.text: I love my computer. It is fast, reliable and well worth the money. I have owned it for a few months, and so far I have had zero problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Dell Basic support is a joke
customer_reviews.text: Del basic support is not good. 2 times they just stop talking after saying hello. they don't hang up they just wait for you to.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D

customer_reviews.title: Onsite Service is a joke
customer_reviews.text: I only bought this computer because it included Onsite service. That turned out to be a big mistake and I have been treated so poorly by Dell that I will never buy anything from Dell again. Their onsite service came, tried to fix it, said they needed a different part, but never ordered it and now they say they can only fix it if I send it in.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Nimkoff

customer_reviews.title: Nice small foot print
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to replace her old computer, she loves the size, the quietness and the speed. Happy wife happy life.
customer_reviews.author: danquet

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: so far, so good. fast, haven't had gliches. had my IT set it up, so I don't know about ease of set up
customer_reviews.author: Possum Trot

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to set up another work station in my warehouse.. So far runs smoothly with not issue
customer_reviews.author: Gabeeon

customer_reviews.title: ssd card to small won't hold many programs does not share with HD
customer_reviews.text: fast quite but needs a 256ssd min or it is near worthless
customer_reviews.author: Southman

customer_reviews.title: My husband's new computer.
customer_reviews.text: He uses the computer for writing. He loves it!! It is everything we expected.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy all the way around with this computer so far! Super easy set up!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great computer and value
customer_reviews.text: Computer works great and efficiently, product arrived well packaged. Excellent purchase, would highly rexommend this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Boris G. Gracias

customer_reviews.title: Quality Computer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this computer to function only for personal use by certainly seems to have all the components to operate a small business. I’d say this is a very good value. The computer is quick and the functions are more than adequate for the investment made.
customer_reviews.author: Betty W.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for desired use.
customer_reviews.text: Used for genealogy and web-based access. Temporary storage of photos and documents until transferred to 'permanent' cloud-based and external drives. Little or no gaming use.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Good regular box win 10
customer_reviews.text: Nice and small footprint, quiet and fast. Works perfectly. A good deal. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: IcyChris

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Over Promises
customer_reviews.text: Had Windows Home not Pro, neither comes with product key. Less RAM than indicated; said 12gb in description and I received 8GB. Amazon not helpful at all in resolving either of these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for college
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for large-scale college products. Not a computer to last years and years, nor for heavy gaming, but great for college!!
customer_reviews.author: Elicia

customer_reviews.title: Purchased on monthly payments! - Seller Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Received product on time, packaging was excellent, computer booted up correctly. Not a problem with anything! Computer came with a two year warranty. I'll most likely buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Impressively small and powerful
customer_reviews.text: It performs as advertised and is perfect for our application. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well with monitors
customer_reviews.text: Does not work well with monitors, hards drive is not so good
customer_reviews.author: randolph

customer_reviews.title: It's super fast!
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described....super fast and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: David Mould

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL
customer_reviews.text: It is a fabulous computer and it run exceptionally well.
customer_reviews.author: Hassan Ahmed Dilib, Madison, Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Sleek
customer_reviews.text: This computer from dell is modrately fast and the tower is very compact and space saving. It suites my basic need for computing.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Fast, small, so far so good
customer_reviews.text: Was way smaller than my other dell, but had to move into the Micro 10 series, all loaded great, so far so good. Unit is fast and works great with my quickbooks
customer_reviews.author: Skip D.

product_meta.title: Dell Inspiron 3470 Desktop, 2 Year Onsite Service after remote diagnosis, 9th Gen Intel Core i5-9400 6-Core 4.1GHz Proc w/Intel Turbo Boost, 12GB DDR4 RAM, 1TB HDD+128GB SSD, DVD RW, Windows 10 Pro
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:i5|12GB|1TBHDD|128GB SSD| Pattern Name:DesktopWith powerful performance and the latest Intel processors the Inspiron 3470 is featured-packed with infinite potential for you and your family It features an Intel Core i5 processor and an extra venting area in the front and the side The improved inlet airflow design allows optimal system cooling for quiet and efficient performance Designed to take up less space yet still deliver the same robust performance and storage capacity expected of a desktop tower Includes 2 Year Onsite Service after Remote Diagnosis - Remote diagnosis may involve multiple or extended sessions before a technician or part is dispatched Onsite service provided by Dell Marketing LP For complete details see dell /servicecontracts Limited Hardware is available at dell /
feature_bullets: Small form Factor takes up less space while delivering robust performance
2 Year Onsite Service after remote diagnosis
9th Generation Intel Core i5-9400 [6-Core/6-Thread 9M Cache 4 1GHz processor with Intel Turbo Boost Technology]
Dvd-RW drive (Reads and Writes to DVD/CD)
Dell KB216 wired Keyboard Dell MS116 wired mouse

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars244 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
